bio2: My interests span AI research, filmmaking, and debating. Currently in 12th grade at Chingshin Academy in Taipei, Taiwan, I balance academics with pursuing unconventional projects that fascinate me. But beyond the code and cameras, I believe the best creations are those that solve problems and open doors for others.
bio3: I collect experiences like stamps in a passport, sharing discoveries with everyone I meet along the way. From LEGO mechanisms at age 4 to LLM safety research today, I remain that wide-eyed wanderer, forever asking: "What lies beyond the next frontier?"
